entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon except west 40 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait late this afternoon. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind light except west 40 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait this evening and after midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 9.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except west 50 gusting to 70 near Juan de Fuca Strait. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Monday 10 April 2023
